title: Play in the snow
brief_description: Teaches good health habits and encourages wholesome social relationships by depicting the activities of three small children on several cold, winter days in a New England town. The children build a snowman, make snowballs and go coasting and skiing. In all these activities the children practice rules of safety and good sportsmanship.
